description:
Smoker`s life is spared by the arrival of an old friend. Law reveals some shocking news about Caesar`s partnership with Doflamingo, and Momonosuke uses his youth to get cozy with Robin and Nami!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La tension monte. Aokiji contre Doflamingo !
موت لوفي في البحر؟! انهيار تحالف القراصنة!
緊迫! 青キジVSドフラミンゴ
